## Categorical Data Visualization:

```{r}
library(datasets)
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = Diet)) +
  geom_bar()
```


## Numerical Data Visualization:

```{r}
library(datasets)
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(ChickWeight, aes(x = weight, y=Diet)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
